title: The Collected Short Works of Poul Anderson, Volume 1: Call Me Joe
description: Call Me Joe is a collection of short Science Fiction of Poul Anderson. Published in a high-quality hard cover edition. This volume includes some of his best short works, including "Time Patrol", "Haiku", "The Man Who Came Early", "Turning Point", "The Sharing of the Flesh".
author: Rick Katze
